content: a crochet pattern by tigersdiy keep cozy all year round with this beautiful hat which is infinitely adaptable to suit your every need the avoyelles beanie is a surprisingly quick knitting project with a fun texture make avoyelles beanie your own with color blocking stripes or holding multiple yarns together to create a marled effect or add a fluffy halo working each section of the hat in a different color yarn or pattern will create different looks when worn for effortless fun we love using self-striping yarns for avoyelles beanie avoyelles 1 terms and acknowledgement thank you so much for purchasing this pattern your support means a lot to me i hope you enjoy making your hat as much as i did if you have any questions or comments please do not hesitate to contact me i would love to get connected with you e-mail traibapnhi@gmail com you may share photos of your work on social media with the hashtag #avoyellesbeanie i would be so happy to see and share your versions of the hat please do not copy sell or share this pattern s texts pictures and instructions this pattern is made for personal use you may also sell your items made of this pattern and please credit me adjust your gauge or use a smaller knitting needles directions are for size small/medium changes for size large are in parentheses the pattern has a 2-stitch repeat throughout so additional sizes could be made in multiples of 2 if needed additionally the height of the hat can be made shorter or longer by simply knitting more or less of the 8-round repeat just be sure to end the body of the hat
